vsParam:
Oh, guys... Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh!
You're the legendary Captain Verbena, aren't you?!

Exactly. Um...
They say... you want to see me?

Yup! Ahem ahem...
I'll come straight to the point, Captain Verbena!

Why so suddenly!? Even that's what you want,
how could it be possible to have a Ghost secretary!?

Oh, I tend to forget things as I'm getting older.
So I decided to hire a secretary.

Captain Verbena was born in a notable family,
also known as an outstanding student.

Plus, you've become extremely courageous after
years' pirate life! Courage is all that business needs.

Besides, you're a Ghost, so you won't die before me!
Beyond that, you're so beautiful! So uniquely beautiful!

Think about it.
Aren't you the perfect candidate for me?

Alright, you may get your point. But...
Verbena will be mad at you even with all the compliment...

Hehe... Hahahaha! I can't believe someone needs
a Ghost to be his secretary...
I do appreciate you and I'd like to accept your offer.
Huh——!? You... You'd like to accept it!?

Hehehe, excellent! Deal!
I'm Golden Rod, nice to meet you.

OK, Lord Golden Rod.
I'll be strict with you as I'm your secretary now.

No problem, looking forward to your performance.
Hehehehe!
I think this is over for now.

... Yeah, she accepted it... Yeah.
I guess it's a happy ending? Probably...

The Ghost Secretary is a real thing now...
I can't believe this did happen... Haha, hahaha...
